metadata.title: CVE-2024-31580 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: PyTorch before v2.2.0 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflowvulnerability in the component /runtime/vararg_functions.cpp. Thisvulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via acrafted input.

criterions.comment: pytorch package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
